|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500224 Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board. See also the [[TP-LINK TL-WDR4300]] which shares the same hardware. This device does, however, have a different stock firmware header. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-74961-1-1.html Technical data]
[http://www.chiphell.com/thread-383664-1-1.html Images]
